NAME: Pony
AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Search https://derpibooru.org/ for pony pictures.

Usage: [p]pony [tags...]: Fetch the latest pony image
[p]ponyr [tags...]: Fetch a random pony image
[p]ponyfilter list: Lists available Derpibooru filters
[p]ponyfilter set [filter name]: Set the current server's filter
[p]ponyfilter add [filter name] [filter id]: Add a filter
[p]ponyfilter del [filter name]: Delete a filter

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
